verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Unto thee, O Jehovah<WH3068>, will I call<WH7121>: My rock<WH6697>, be not thou deaf<WH2814> unto me<WH2790>; Lest, if thou be silent unto me<WH4911>, I become like them that go down<WH3381> into the pit<WH953>.
Hear <WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of my supplications<WH8469>, when I cry<WH7768> unto thee<WH5375>, When I lift up my hands<WH3027> toward thy holy<WH6944> oracle<WH1687>.

Draw me not away<WH4900> with the wicked<WH7563>, And with the workers<WH6466> of iniquity<WH205>; That speak<WH1696> peace<WH7965> with their neighbors<WH7453>, But mischief<WH7451> is in their hearts<WH3824>.

Give <WH5414> them according to their work<WH6467>, and according to the wickedness<WH7455> of their doings<WH4611>: Give<WH5414> them after the operation<WH4639> of their hands<WH3027>; Render<WH7725> to them their desert<WH1576>.
Because they regard<WH995> not the works<WH6468> of Jehovah<WH3068>, Nor the operation<WH4639> of his hands<WH3027>, He will break<WH2040> them down and not build them up<WH1129>.
Blessed <WH1288> be Jehovah<WH3068>, Because he hath heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of my supplications<WH8469>.

Jehovah <WH3068> is my strength<WH5797> and my shield<WH4043>; My heart<WH3820> hath trusted<WH982> in him<WH5826>, and I am helped: Therefore my heart<WH3820> greatly rejoiceth<WH5937>; And with my song<WH7892> will I praise him<WH3034>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is their strength<WH5797>, And he is a stronghold<WH4581> of salvation<WH3444> to his anointed<WH4899>.
Save <WH3467> thy people<WH5971>, and bless<WH1288> thine inheritance<WH5159>: Be their shepherd<WH7462> also<WH5375>, and bear them up for ever<WH5769>.
